snippet: Ali Musa Daqduq, accused by American military prosecutors of the killing of American troops, terrorism and espionage, was released despite the entreaties of the Obama administration.
abstract: Iraq releases Hezbollah operative Ali Musa Daqduq, who American military prosecutors accuse of killing American troops, terrorism and espionage; Iraqi officials say that, despite entreaties of Obama administration, they had run out of legal options to hold Daqduq.
lead_paragraph: Ali Musa Daqduq, accused by American military prosecutors of the killing of American troops, terrorism and espionage, was released despite the entreaties of the Obama administration.

headline.seo: Iraq Said to Release Ali Musa Daqduq, a Hezbollah Operative
headline.main: Against U.S. Wishes, Iraq Releases Man Accused of Killing American Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Against U.S. Wishes, Iraq Releases Man Accused of Killing American Soldiers
